comment: Title:- Lewis Structures 2 & Resonance    - yk, we're gonna connect concepts together sometimes. That's the point! @03:52   - PES [GRAPH:    #electron v/s energy]   - PES [sulfur v/s chlorine ===> Everything (ig every PES Line/peak) is gonna shift over to left, if you go to Chlorine) @07:13   - C₂H₄O [Acetaldehyde] @07:32 ==> Be careful with LEWIS @07:41 ====> "What is Not wrong with this?" @08:12 ====> I didn't even get the #e right! @09:35  #Resonance @11:43   - Describes DELOCALIZATION @12:53 (of electron in Molecules)   - Measuring Bond Lengths @14:40   - Electrons do things to be happy @15:17 ====> "If I delocalize 'accross the whole molecule', I can be Happier! @15:27   - Back n' Forth SO FAST ===> that it's an Average @15:55   - What Happened to the electrons? @16:49   - The Way to Reaaaaaalllyyyyyy Think about it @18:22 ====> Resonance Hybrid Structure @18:55 ====> What happens to FormalCharges? @20:09  #FormalCharge   - Should add up to "Charge of Molecule" i.e. ZERO if neutral, INTEGER if ionic-molecule:- @20:35  #Resonance-Structs   - What are Not Resonance Structures? @21:28   - ONLY CHANGE LOCATION OF ELECTRONS @22:00   - [CO₃]²¯ @23:18  #[CNS]¯   - ThioCyaNate Anion @24:18   - There's one Last Point that we Need to learn @27:38 ====> -ve FormalCharge should be on the more Electro-negative ATOM   - Thinking in terms of RESONANCE to figure out the Ground State Structure @29:35  #Why This Matters @30:45 ====> Benzene is Delocalized @33:16 (Delocalization to Stabilize)     #Exceptions to Lewis @37:51   - Chemistry Lives in the FAST LANE @38:20 ==> They know about the Rules & They also know that those rules are also meant to be Broken!   - BF₃ @38:36   - Boron can be electron-defficient @39:58   - SF₄ @40:15   - Sulfur can have EXPANDED-OCTET @40:40  ====> Go down the periodic table & --> You will find atoms more willing like Sulfur @41:16  #WHY EXCEPTIONS? ====> Shapes @41:02 & Quantum Physics  #Get your hands on the material @41:50
